thread.section_title: FabKids Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FabKids | fabkids.com | 2 of 116
thread.title: Tammy

author: Tammy
title: Tammy
text:
The outfit was purchased for my daughter, which is extremely petit and hard to find clothes that fit her. To my surprise the outfit I purchased for her, fit her perfectly. It's great to finally find some place to buy her clothes and not worry about them fitting.
The quality of the clothing is outstanding. So she will be able to get plenty of wear out of them.
I will definitely order again!
